definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block pinned="false" h="47" w="186">Tests if the light level is 8 or above like regular crops.</comment><value name="A"><block type="world_data_light_level"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"><comment type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"><comment pinned="false" h="32" w="117">Already centered</comment></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="block_is_tagged_in"><comment pinned="false" h="48" w="232">Tests for the block tag that the crop can grow on e.g. farmland, dirt etc.</comment><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="return_logic"><comment pinned="false" h="48" w="143">Will return ture if both conditions are met.</comment><value name="return"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="return_logic"><comment pinned="false" h="61" w="220">If one of the conditions fails this will return false and the block will pop off (break) and drop its items.</comment><value name="return"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
